mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_orderfather ( order_id, payment_money, goods_total, order_status, pay_status, user_code, order_time, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, version) values ( #{orderId}, #{sum}, #{total}, 1, 0, #{userCode}, now(), 0, now(), #{userCode}, now(), 0 )

insert into t_sys_orderson ( order_id, sku_no, goods_cnt, order_money, selling_money, is_deleted, create_user, create_time )values ( #{orderId}, #{skuNo}, #{goodsCnt2}, #{totalPrice}, #{sellingPrice}, 0, #{userCode}, now() )
mapper.select: select order_id , order_status , goods_total , payment_money from t_sys_orderfather where is_deleted = 0 and user_code = #{userCode}

select a.sku_no skuNo, b.picture_url pictureUrl, b.sku_name skuName, b.detail detail, a.selling_money sellingPrice, a.goods_cnt goodsCnt from t_sys_orderson a, t_sys_goods b where a.sku_no = b.sku_no and a.order_id = #{order_id} order by a.goods_cnt ASC

select a.sku_no skuNo, b.picture_url pictureUrl, b.sku_name skuName, b.detail detail, a.selling_money sellingPrice, a.goods_cnt goodsCnt from t_sys_orderson a, t_sys_goods b where a.sku_no = b.sku_no and a.order_id = #{order_id} order by a.goods_cnt ASC

select a.order_id order_id, a.create_time create_time, a.order_status order_status, a.goods_total goods_total, a.payment_money payment_money, c.store_name store_name, GROUP_CONCAT(c.province,c.city,c.area,c.store_address) address from t_sys_orderfather a, t_client_info b, t_sys_store c where a.user_code = b.client_user_code and b.invite_code = c.invitation_code and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.order_id = #{orderId}

insert.foreach: insert into t_sys_goodsevaluate (order_id, user_code, sku_no, store_no, star_level, appraise_info, photo_url, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, version )values ( #{orderId}, #{userCode}, #{mapList.skuNo}, (select invite_code from t_client_info where is_deleted =0 and client_user_code = #{userCode}), #{mapList.starLevel}, #{mapList.appraiseInfo}, #{mapList.photoUrl}, #{isDeleted}, #{userCode}, now(), 0 )

mapper.update: update t_sys_orderfather set order_status = 4, update_time = now(), update_user = #{userCode}, version = version + 1 where order_id = #{orderId} and version = #{version} and order_status = 3
